```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis

import os
import glob

# Use glob to find all *.qmd files
qmd_files = glob.glob(os.path.join(".", "*.qmd"))
# Filter out files that begin with "_"
qmd_files = [f for f in qmd_files if not os.path.basename(f).startswith("_")]

for qmd_file in qmd_files:
    file_name = os.path.basename(qmd_file)
    print(f'<iframe src="{file_name}" width="275" height="125"></iframe>\n')

```
